safetyTips: Our gloved delivery drivers are the only two people handling delivery boxes and bags, and we have a maximum of three team members at any time in store with no access for customers. We are able to handle goods as little as possible (just one person picking your order) and our cleaning and hygiene regime is to the extreme (especially when Lucia is in!).
name: InsideOut Health
description: We are Reigate's independent health food shop! We are a team of Nutritional Therapists with a passion for good food, environmentally friendly living and natural skincare. We stock earth friendly household products, practitioner level supplements, whole foods, chilled and frozen food, clean bodycare ranges and amazing speciality foods such as gluten free, organic dairy and vegan products. During lockdown we are offering FREE DELIVERY to Reigate, Redhill and surrounding areas including Banstead, Dorking and Tadworth.

safetyTips: Kitchen is deep cleaned every day and food is prepared wearing full PPE. Delivery driver with be wearing a hazmat suit, face mask, and a fresh pair of gloves. They will drop the food at your door, knock, and stand back 5 meters minimum until you open the door and collect your food.
name: The Gallery
description: We are a Café selling artisan sandwiches, drinks, and snacks. We also sell survival packages with essentials such as bread, milk, eggs, soap, tea bags, and jam and butter portions. These packages will also be available for free for vulnerable people in the community and have been paid forward by other generous locals. Ask us about paying it forward yourself if you would like to support our efforts and are in a position to do so.

safetyTips: We operate a signature free, drop and go delivery system
name: The Vineking
description: We are an Independent Wine Merchants and have been in Reigate since 2005.  We stock and deliver a wide range of wines, starting from £7.50 but also beers, spirits and we Deli Boards to enjoy at home too.  We offer free local delivery for all orders over £50, otherwise there is a £5 delivery charge.

safetyTips: Goods are delivered on door steps. Drivers get a safe distance back and await for customer to take goods from crate/box. Customer shuts door and driver collects box/crate.
name: Underwood Meat Company
address: Unit 4 Corium House, Douglas Drive, Godalming GU7 1JX
description: Fresh Butchery meats.

safetyTips: Given the current situation, please rest assured that all staff, including drivers will take recommended precautions when handling your order.
name: Upstream Seafoods
description: Fish wholesalers to restaurants hotels, caterers and now delivering to private addresses.

safetyTips: No contact delivery. We ring your doorbell/knock your knocker to let you know the delivery has arrived.
name: Chalk Hills Bakery
description: We're an artisan bakery supplying proper bread, pastries and cakes to Reigate, Redhill, Horley and areas in between.

safetyTips: Contactless free delivery within 15 miles of Redhill.
name: Coppertop Candles
description: Natural, vegan handmade aromatherapy candles, room diffusers & gift-sets using essential oils.

safetyTips: All social distancing guidelines observed when delivering. Will drop knock and leave!
name: Crumbs Brewing
description: We make beer using unsold loaves from Chalk Hills Bakery in Reigate. We offer free delivery of all our range, either as cases or smaller gift packs: Sourdough Pale Ale 4.2%, Bloomin’ Amber Lager 4.8%, Rye Ruby Ale 5.0%. We also deliver nationally by courier.

name: Cullenders Parkside
description: At Cullenders we are known for good quality homemade food. We are delivering dishes from a menu we have created including; meze, soup, pate, mousakka, short rib ragu, vegan options, cheese boards, lemon possets and other dishes. The dishes are freshly prepared and delivered chilled and ready to re-heat at home. We have a varying menu that will be changing every few weeks.
safetyTips: Food is packaged up, delivered and left on your doorstep.
Contactless deliveries, left on doorstep or safe place.
name: Fresh Connect
description: Delivering fruits, vegetables, dairy, dried & household goods

safetyTips: UK wide delivery and no contact click-and-collect.
name: Mandira’s Kitchen
address: Silent Pool, Shere Road, Albury GU5 9BW
description: Award-winning Indian freezer meals. Handmade in small batches using fresh produce and no additives. Gluten free with dairy free and vegan options. Ready from frozen in 4 minutes. UK wide delivery and no contact click-and-collect.

safetyTips: Enhanced cleaning regimes, non-contact delivery (to front door or garage), drivers wear face masks and gloves.
name: RDO Kitchens & Appliances
address: RDO Kitchen Appliances Bancroft Road, Reigate RH2 7RP
description: RDO Kitchens & Appliances is a major online appliance retailer and bespoke kitchen designer based in Reigate, Surrey. At RDO, we’re passionate about delivering our customers the best possible shopping experience, even during lockdown. We’re still offering free non-contact delivery and the best possible advice and service when it comes to kitchens and appliances. Thousands of appliances are available for non-contact click&collect from our 16,000 square foot warehouse in Salfords, Surrey.

safetyTips: Virtual appointments to comply with social distancing rules, and sealed products home delivered.
name: Sonia Christie
description: Having lost over 7 stone myself, and maintained for years, I am an Above and Beyond award winning consultant, supporting others to get themselves healthier and slimmer. With now virtual 1-to-1 appointments due to the current pandemic, and a personalised plan, with nutritionally balanced products that can be delivered direct to your door. With limited socialising, there’s never been a better time to lose weight!

safetyTips: All of our staff are wearing PPE. We are offering a ZERO CONTACT delivery service.
name: Spaghetti Tree
address: 1 Walton Street, Walton on the Hill, Tadworth KT20 7RW
description: We are an independent family run restaurant. We deliver everything from pizza, pasta, steak, fish and desserts. We also delivery wine, cocktails, beers and ciders.

safetyTips: Doorstep deliveries, non-contact.
name: Squires Garden Centre
description: Plants & garden accessories.

safetyTips: PayPal - therefore no cash on delivery. Knock and produce is left on the doorstep - no face-to-face contact necessary!
name: P&I Fruits Ltd
description: Fresh fruit and veg wholesaler in New Covent Garden Market - usually supplying the hospitality trade around London. Now using its resources to ensure the local areas can get the fruit, veg, salad, berries & more that they need.

safetyTips: Following all government guidelines. Keeping 2m distance at all times. Customers can pay through Pay Pal or contactless to save any contact. Also using disposable gloves when making delivery - washing and sanitising hands regularly.
name: Surrey & Sussex Fresh Fruit & Veg Supplies
description: We supply the freshest fruit & veg with the highest of quality to help those who are in isolation, the vulnerable and to help those stay home & stay safe. We offer a range of mixed fruit & veg boxes.

safetyTips: All our staff are trained fully in food hygiene regulations, COVID health and safety for key workers, all staff carry hand sanitiser and disposable safety gloves.
name: The Charlwood Delivery
address: The Charlwood, 12 The Street, Charlwood RH6 0BE
description: Normally an amazing restaurant. On the 20 March we became an amazing food delivery operations - supplying fresh quality food and groceries (meats, veg, fruit, dairy, provisions) and restaurant quality hot takeaway food and drinks.

safetyTips: No contact delivery and one person at time in the shop.
name: Duke's Yard Café, Deli & Pizzeria
description: We are known as a pub, we are now a deli/shop and takeaway delivery service. We deliver personal food boxes and we provide meals including Thai, Chinese, wood-fired pizzas and British cuisine. We sell fresh fruit and veg, and other food essentials. We stock gluten-free, vegan and dairy alternatives.

safetyTips: Safe social distancing at 2m.
name: Munchies Grill
description: Breakfast and kebabs. Available on Just Eat.

safetyTips: Kerbside delivery, non-contact, payment over the phone only.
name: Priory Farm Nursery
address: Sandy Lane, South Nutfield, Redhill RH1 4EJ
description: Home grown plants, garden furniture, BBQ and compost.

safetyTips: Each customer has an allocated time slot where they collect the food from an isolated table to ensure no contact with anyone.
name: Two Many Cooks
description: Normally catering private parties and events, now doing frozen ready meals, fresh fruit and veg boxes, pantry boxes, lunch boxes with our wonderful tarts and sausage rolls.

safetyTips: We have designated time slots for you to collect your takeaway so there is only ever one customer picking up at any one time. At your designated time slot your takeaway will be placed on a table outside the front door. On the table will be some hand gel which you are welcome to use before removing you bag, then just grab and go.
name: Skimmington Castle
description: Our new drive-thru service offers our famous fish pies, delicious home cooked roasts and traditional pub classics. Collection only.

safetyTips: Contactless Collection. If delivered, social distancing guidelines are observed.
name: The Fresh Coffee Company
description: We offer a hand-picked selection of premium coffees, artisan hand-blended teas and award winning hot chocolate.

safetyTips: Delivery drivers wearing face masks and gloves.
name: The Pilot's Hub
address: Hangar 9, Redhill Aerodrome, Kingsmill Lane, Redhill RH1 5JY
description: We are a locally renowned brasserie and restaurant based at Redhill Aerodrome popular for our freshly cooked breakfast and lunches and supporting the emergency services based at the airfield  We source excellent quality vegetables, dairy produce, fruit, meat, bread, and many extras that we provide with no-contact, free of charge delivery. Collection is available too, and we have a selection of ready-prepared dishes and ready-to-eat food to whet your appetite ! We are offering the opportunity to support the the NHS at East Surrey Hospital with our NHS veg box scheme.

safetyTips: Our wholesaler is working to government guildelines and delivering to an empty shop. We are closed to the public and making contactless deliveries only. Orders taken via telephone, website or email.
name: Willows of Reigate
description: We are currently making contactless deliveries only of bouquets and plants and providing funeral tributes by special request.

safetyTips: We only allow one person into the restaurant at all times and when delivering we offer a hands-free delivery service if you wish. All our staff wear gloves and wash their hands every 20 minutes as advised by the government. We also use hand sanitiser and have a sanitiser spray that is used on top of our daily cleaning routine.
name: Eighty Ate Burger
description: Our menu features an array of juicy, succulent meats that are sourced from a local butcher here in Reigate. As a burger lover, we encourage you to come along and try our eccentric burgers! We are currently open for takeaway and delivery service. We offer a delivery service within a 5 mile radius of the restaurant, alongside this we are also on Deliveroo and they offer a 3 mile radius from the restaurant.

safetyTips: Standing two metres apart, leave at the door, using gloves, wiping clean.
name: Flower Farm
address: Flower Farm, Oxted Road, Godstone RH9 8DE
description: Offering a wide range of fresh farm produce, home grown and locally sourced vegetables, fruit, meat and eggs reared on the farm, as well as a wide range of bespoke items from artisan nut butters and olive oil to pasta and and chilli jams. Plus a selection of beer and ales, brewed on the farm, wine and cider from a local vineyard. With 48 hour home delivery and collection.

safetyTips: We are following government guidelines strictly with social distancing. We are only working externally so will not come inside properties. We are wearing gloves at all times and carrying hand sanitiser following strict hand washing routines.
name: SuperClean
description: Very friendly, professional and 5/5 star gutter cleaning service. We provide a gutter vacuum cleaning service to unblock and clear gutters to allow them to function properly, directing rain water to the downpipes and away from your home. We also provide a gutter cleaning service to wash and clean dirty gutters including the fascia and soffits to get them sparkling clean and totally transform the appearance of your home.

safetyTips: All our staff wear gloves and use hand sanitiser and wash their hand every 20 minutes as per government guidelines. We only allow one person in the restaurant at any one time for collections. We offer a hands-free delivery service for our customers if they wish.
name: Regional Thai Taste
description: We are currently open for a takeaway and delivery service. We have delivery drivers working from our restaurant and we off a delivery of 5 mile radius from the restaurant, alongside this we are also on Deliveroo and they offer a 3 mile radius from the restaurant.

safetyTips: Pavement collection or delivery by bicycle or on foot. Office is spray-cleaned frequently with isopropyl alcohol.
name: All Your Business Needs
description: Still printing Locally - collection or delivery. A6 to A1 on a range of papers. Documents, photographs, posters, banners and plans. Stationery including 80gsm bond paper. We also offer web services and some help with email and communications software. Although our over the counter service and shopfront is closed, we are able to offer pavement collection. Alternatively we can offer delivery by bicycle or on foot for 20% of the order value (£2.50 minimum).

safetyTips: Our delivery team are taking every precaution they possibly can to ensure the safety of our customers. That includes using appropriate PPE and maintaining a safe distance when making deliveries.
name: Hofmeister Brewing Company
description: Hofmeister Helles is an authentic imported Bavarian lager. Made using just mineral water, barley and hops, Hofmeister beer is lagered slower at zero degrees, for a fresh, crisp, Helles lager. Being local, we're opening up free delivery of our cases of 24 x 330ml bottles to customers in Reigate and within a 15 mile radius. Each case is £39.99 delivered to your door - simply email or call the team to order and we'll do the rest.

safetyTips: Online ordering, contactless pay, products wiped with alcohol.
name: Pilgrim Brewery
description: Craft Brewery based in Reigate since 1984 producing traditional ales, modern beers and lagers.

safetyTips: Wearing face-mask and sanitising before and after each delivery. Orders are delivered in paper carrier bags that have handles to ensure minimal surface contact. Delivery is left, doorbell rang or door knocked, then I step back to the pavement to wait for customer to acknowledge me.
name: Redhill Confetti
description: Handmade crafts and make-at-home kits to entertain kids and adults alike.

safetyTips: Locksmith’s are all CRB checked, carry PPE and disinfectant wipes for before and after work.

address: Pool House, Bancroft Road, Reigate RH2 7RP
description: We are still open by appointment for emergency calls and key cutting at the shop. We will endeavour to do our best to help you and your business in the quickest possible time.

safetyTips: Mask, gloves, social distancing
name: This Wild House
description: Homewares & lifestyle store combining a mixture of bohemian living with elegant Scandinavian simplicity.

safetyTips: I use a protective mask and gloves when I make and pack your orders, as well as regularly disinfecting my work space. I always keep distance as per government regulations at delivery or collection.
name: Red Fox Candle
description: Natural vegan candles and tea lights, blended with essential oils. Inspired by nature for your self-care and wellbeing. Red Fox candles can help you combat anxiety, unwind and feel more connected with yourself.

safetyTips: All boxes are wrapped in film 24 hours before delivery to allow for easy packaging removal, and hand-washing.
name: Fancy That Cake Company
description: Cakes, cake pops, graze boxes.

safetyTips: Leave delivery outside door, knock/ring doorbell and leave.

description: Organic, gluten, dairy and refined sugar free nourishing treats. Coconut macaroons and bites, raw slices, cookies and more. Mostly vegan and grain free options.

safetyTips: We are taking an extra level of care to keep our customers safe at all times, we have put in place the 2m distance and if you are coming to collect your takeaway we are ensuring we only have one customer in at a time. If you wish a contact free delivery we will leave your food and drink in the place we have been instructed, payments for this will be made when you order. We understand this is a very difficult time for everybody but we want to keep everyone as safe as possible.
name: The Admiral Inn
description: The Admiral Inn is a small local pub in Reigate where you can find us on Nutley Lane. We are offering a free home delivery service for pizzas, burgers, beers, wine and a selection of soft drinks.

safetyTips: We will place flowers on the doorstep then knock and step away.

description: Florist, delivery flowers and funeral tributes.

safetyTips: All deliveries will be taken remotely. We will do contactless deliveries and gloves/masks will be worn as needed.
name: Vintage Rose Crockery Hire
description: We are a local business supplying gorgeous vintage crockery. If you or a loved one are celebrating a birthday/ anniversary during lockdown and are looking to make it a bit special we will drop off all you need to have a tea party in the comfort of your own home! We have also teamed up with a local cake-maker to offer an afternoon tea package.

safetyTips: One person fulfilling and dispatching orders.
name: Houndsley
description: Stylish, cleverly designed dog walking bags and accessories.

safetyTips: Frequent and effective hand washing with antibacterial hand wash in the kitchen. Frequent use of food safe antibacterial surface cleaner in the kitchen and all food storage and preparation areas. Aprons and kitchen wear frequently laundered on 60 degrees. Frequent changes of kitchen gloves. All order payments taken online through the website. Minimised local deliveries only 2 days per week. Maintaining social distancing rules when delivering. Wearing relevant PPE when making deliveries.
name: eat VEGAN kitchen
description: eat VEGAN kitchen is a newly formed company offering a range of delicious freshly prepared home cooked gourmet vegan dishes delivered straight to your door!

safetyTips: Contact-free payments and free contact-free delivery to Redhill, Reigate & surrounding areas.

safetyTips: One person fulfilling and dispatching orders.

safetyTips: Following government guidelines and hygiene.

safetyTips: I use a courier as I am shielding so the only contact would be the delivery driver.

safetyTips: All goods stored in airtight containers, mask and gloves worn during production, all areas sanitised. Contactless courier deliveries - free local (Reigate) delivery. All surfaces are sanitised prior to production. I wear mask and gloves whilst handling sweets. Contactless collection and courier deliveries.

We organise pre-arranged pickup times to ensure there are no queues when you arrive. I will place your order on a table outside and step away for you to pick it up. We will provide bank account details for payment so no cash is handled.

description: A range of delicious restaurant quality takeaways for collection. If you fancy a special meal with your partner or maybe a BBQ in the sun, you can see all our menus on our website. For bespoke orders or allergies, please give me a ring and we can discuss.
